headline: Computer Engineering @ UCLA
description: Hi! I'm a junior majoring in Computer Engineering at the University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA). Through club and research projects, hackathons, and internships, I've worked on developing solutions in healthcare technology, automation, and data-driven applications. I enjoy tackling complex problems and translating them into effective, scalable solutions. I hope to leverage my technical skills in software engineering to create impactful solutions that drive positive, lasting change in society.
footnote: I am currently looking for Summer 2025 internships! Based in Los Angeles, open to relocation.
